name: Grass Knot
effect: Makes Contact. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every 25 kgs. of weight on the foe. Up to +4 Extra Dice may be added this way. If the target's weight is 200 kgs. or greater, add 5 Extra Dice instead.
description: The user snares the target's feet with grass, making it fall to the ground. The bigger the foe the harder the fall.
